Side Effects: Uneven skinExtreme moodiness
Comments: Have my period too early as expected

Side Effects: I was already feeling depressed_ doctor said it might neutralize my emotions or make it worse but I need it for 3 months as assessment to know. I'm moody_ depressed_ I cry a lot_ feeling anxious about future more_ not motivated_ no appetite_ barely can taste food_don't feel hungry_ my skin terrible more acne.  Two and half months so far_ terrible bleeding 3 times month and my regular cycle is 4 days_now is 7 days_  awful pill
Caused two yeast infections within the first month_ tenderness of breasts_ irritation and loss of energy_ spotting
Caused two yeast infections within the first month_ tenderness of breasts_ irritation and loss of energy_ spotting
Emotional_ sad/depressed_ irritable_ cramping (while not on period)
Comments: The first 3 months of this pill wasn't too bad. I bled a little through the first 2 weeks of taking it. After the 4th month my partner had to talk to me about how emotional and irritable I was. I didn't notice how bad I was getting until he told me. I became a very angry_ depressed and all around horrible person which is very unlike me. Completely stopping this pill. Not worth the stress in my relationship.

Side Effects: At first I didn't connect the dots_ but for the past 2 months that I've been taking this pill it's been making me very easily irritated_ emotional_ out of control and it's starting to affect my life. I am not of I should wait it out. Other than that_ acne has cleared up and I have no cramping.
Depressed feelings_ sad_ emotional_ not myself_ feeling just plain weird!!!
Comments: I can relate to many of these posts after day 6 of taking this pill. Alesse 28. Yesterday day 5 I asked  my boss to Leave because I "felt sad_ and hungry" LoL it was out of character for me to say this or feel this way... The next day I felt even worse I had random crying spells and just felt like life was no longer exciting. I was depressed and just not interested. Oh and the migraines I had! Oh and decreased want of sex... Yeah. Fun! Allll this just to prevent pregnancy! I'm considering stopping after readi g these posts

Side Effects: emotional_ extreme leg pains for at least the first month and then on and off for second month so far. Headaches_ vision problems (I am prone to migraines so those two usually go hand in hand for me)_ frequent fatigue_ out of breath doing regular every day things.
Comments: I know you're supposed to give new pills 3 months but honestly_ it's not even worth it to me. At this point I feel so unhealthy and not myself I wasn't like this when I was on tricyclin lo. Would not recommend. I just finished my second pack_ won't be continuing

Side Effects: Tingling and numbness of limbs_ thinning of hair_ High anxiety issues_ sever full body pains and stiffness_ week long migraines_ Constant spotting or irregular periods_ ovarian cysts problems. Never had any of those problems before taking this pill! I've been off of Alesse for 3 months now and_ my skin is improving_ periods are becoming regular_ ZERO pains or numbness to report_ and my hair is growing again. Also increased energy levels. If you start getting any side effects_ just stop taking it please!
Comments: Tingling and numbness of limbs_ thinning of hair_ High anxiety issues_ sever full body pains and stiffness_ week long migraines_ Constant spotting or irregular periods_ ovarian cysts problems. Never had any of those problems before taking this pill! I've been off of Alesse for 3 months now and_ my skin is improving_ periods are becoming regular_ ZERO pains or numbness to report_ and my hair is growing again. Also increased energy levels. If you start getting any side effects_ just stop taking it please!

Reason: Clear my skin and better periods
Side Effects: I had no appetite and I've lost a significant amount of weight_ my skin cleared up right away and I have no mood swings.
Comments: So far my experience has been great!

Side Effects: Nausea_ headaches_ loss of appitite_ mood swings_ fatigue
Comments: I havent even been taking it a week and I have to stop. I am sick over half of every day and it's conpletelt unbareable I thought it would get better but it's getting worst. I now have a nonstop headache and all I want to do is sleep all day. I never had a problem with other birth control before. I feel moody_ like I could cry at any second_ and it's just honestly not worth the grief to take it.

Side Effects: NONE that were negative
Comments: I love this pill and have had no issues; surprised to hear about all of the bad experiences. My periods would come twice a month and were very heavy; Alesse  has removed all cramping and they are very light. They used to last 7 days; they now last 3 and are barely there. Over the years they are there less and less. I had spotting a few times due to missing pills. No weight gain/mood issues. I plan on taking it until I hope to get pregnant.

Side Effects: Gained weight quite easily when I first went on it. I've never been able to fully get rid of the excess abdominal fat and this is frustrating. Never experienced ANY PMS before going on Alesse and still do not have PMS while on Alesse. I recommend this birth control to other females because of the good experiences I've had and the horror stories associated with other types of birth control pills.
Bloating_ Breast tenderness and increase in size_ Shortened period_ Increase in appetite and depressed
Acne in cheeks
Comments: I absolutely hate Alessa. I've never used birth control pills before but my doctor recommended it. The first month i got a tiny rash on my cheek and it just kept getting worse. I've been off birth control pills for about 6 months now and the acne hasn't gone yet. In fact now i have tiny scars on my cheek. Ahhh! I keep googling home remedies for acne but nothing has worked so far. I have sensitive skin and so it's hard to try everything.

Side Effects: The two years I've been on this pill I've slowly connected the dots. Mood swings_ crying_ depressed_ thinning hair_ bald spots_ acne_ and only feeling good one week out of the whole month. I put on 20lbs over the two years because alesse made me hungry. Also_ got hot flashes on this pill. Just switched tricyclen lo so hopefully everything improves.

Before I started Alesse my periods were crazy and I would either have a period every 2 weeks or I wouldn't have it for five months. I've been on it for a year and a half and now my periods are crazy. I'm on my 2nd this month and it's lasted 10 days so far. Tomorrow I go to the doctor. I'm worried there is something actually wrong with me. My body should be used to this by now. It's weird that it just stopped working though.
depression_ acne_ anxiety_ inability to sleep
Comments: I was switched to Alesse from Yasmin because I had switched GPs_ and she felt that the Yasmin was too high in estrogen. Within a few days_ I started to break out with acne (I haven't had acne in 5 or 6 years)_ and my moods were all over the place. I have had issues with anxiety and depression_ and Alesse brought them back in full force. I would be set off due to little things that never bugged me before_ and I was crying constantly. I also wasn't able to sleep at night. I'm feeling much better now that I'm off of it_ but I will never take this pill again.

Side Effects: Alesse makes you very hungry.  I take at night 1-2 hours before bed to prevent nausea etc. It works great. I took the generic brand alesena and it made me very nauseous and moody. Alesse is good.
Acne

Did not help my cramps at all and resulted in severe emotional instability- uncontrollable fits of crying for no rational reason and severe anxiety over minor things. Had problems by the end of the first month_ but continued to take it because my doctor assured me that I was just adjusting to it and would feel back to normal after three months on it. Quite the opposite_ my mood swings became increasingly worse to the point where I felt like I had no control over myself and worried I'd gone completely crazy. I felt back to normal within three days once I discontinued use. I'm healthy and was taking no medication other than Alesse.
Breast tenderness_ SO tired( couldn't even keep my eyes open) _ headaches_ nausea_ nipple hair_ irritability_ emotional_ bloating_ weight gain..legit thought I was pregnant

After being on Alesse for a few days I started having bad anxiety_ feeling restless and unable to sleep_even with sleeping pills. My cravings for fats_ carbs and sugars have spiked. Taking the pill mid afternoon is followed by nausea and extreme fatigue lasting about 4 hours. I've noticed some chest heaviness and some ankle swelling.

Moodswings_ violence. Ever since I started the pill my boyfriend has been telling me I'm extremely emotional and violent. I fear its ruining my relationship so I'm going to stop. Its been almost a year now and in the past year I've been depressed_ suicidal and I have self harmed. I haven't self harmed or have ever been suicidal before. Don't take this pill.
Nausea_ vomiting_ headaches_ and anxiety

I do not know if they are directly related but I have noticed depression hitting my life hard since about the time I started Alesse. Crying all the time_ extemely irritable and sensitive and very very depressed. Other side effects which I believe are related are long lasting periods (sometimes 10 days early but it's only in small amounts until the real thing comes usually when it's supposed to). Very annoying however as I have to wear pads for 10 days prior to getting the heavy period flow. Extemely irregular period patterns.

Extremely depressed_ moody always snappy the smallest things set me off. when i stopped huge difference in additude but extremely bad cramps and heavy heavy bleeding almost unbearable. never never again.

I was on minovrol before_ but it caused weight loss so my doctor switched me to alesse. The first 2 days were fine_ then I started bleeding_ very heavy for almost 2 weeks now_ lots of blood clots and its horrible to deal with. My cramps and headaches are almost unbearable_ I stopped taking it for the second day now_ my symptoms hopefully clear up.
Extreme depression and irritability_ complete loss of appetite_ raging mood swings_ within 4 days of taking this pill I have experienced 2 extremely bad anxiety attacks.

Headaches_ fatigue_ cramping_ prolonged bleeding_ skin rash_ tingling in hands_ dizziness. Before Alesse_ I was on the Evra patch. I am waiting to have an IUD inserted and my doctor recommended I switch to Alesse while I wait. The first few pills I felt fine. I noticed on the 8th day_ I had developed a rash all along my arms and legs. I started to get headaches in the front of my head which are incredibly painful and lead me to become dizzy. About two weeks_ I started to bleed. I wasn't expecting my period. I have now been bleeding for thirteen days. It's very heavy and there are a lot of blood clots. I have no energy and all I want to do is sleep. Alesse and I are not a good match :( I've never reacted to a pill before.

Shortly after starting Alesse_ I increasingly had high anxiety. Not long after_ I had so much anxiety and irritability I couldn't sleep at night. I would have to take a sleeping pill just to get some rest. I had extreme mood swings_ and itchiness down below. This sounds like a lot of women have had the same side effects as me and I can't believe this is still being prescribed. I basically went bat shit crazy on this birth control pill...stay away.
Vomiting  severe fatigue. Itchy and burning labia moody very depressed and lethargic
Had some spotting but helped with cramps. Gained  10lbs though and some anxiety depression started. Switching to Loestrin 1/20.
Abdominal cramps/pains. Loss of appetite. Stinging during urination. Depression. Moodiness. Fatigue/Tired

I felt so numb emotionally! I felt the effects right away_ 2 days after taking it. By emotionally numb I mean that I couldn't find purpose or joy in anything! I also get huge cramps and I have never had cramps before! Horrible_ horrible pill!
Depression_ irritablily_ extreme exhaustion
Comments: This is horrible.  I was previously on MinOvral with no problems.  My ob/gyn switched me to lower dose estrogen - huge mistake.  I was a mess.....when you go from being a normal person to wanting to stick your head in the oven - something is terribly wrong.  Despite my ob/gyn (an elderly male!) telling me it couldn't be this pill_ I insisted he switch me back.  It's only been 4 days and I already notice a huge difference.

Side Effects: First few months I spotted but after that its been perfect. Better skin_regular periods for the first time in my life. Tried yaz but was switched to this because I smoke occasionally. Hated yaz but love alesse!
No known side effects. Noticing now a lighter period and shorter which I will gladly take!! :)
Migraines_ nausea_ breast tenderness_ very high libido
Comments: For the first two months I was nauseous every day_ all day long_ and especially right after eating. I have been on two other BC pills before this one_ but had to stop because they gave me migraines (which i have never had when not on BC). When I was on Yaz I stopped because I got a migraines and the left side of my body went numb. After getting another migraine on Alesse_ I've decided BC pills are something my body can't tolerate. I did_ however_ enjoy that in the second month of Alesse my libido was much higher than usual_ and my boyfriend did not mind!

Side Effects: At first this pill was awesome- like 1 yr x awesome. No side effects at all until my face got brown patches (melasma)  everywhere that get worse with sun exposure. Not even SPF helps. I've been able to reduce the color by staying out of the sun as much as I can_ photo facials ($$$)_ and daily SPF and lightening creams but it still remains!! I'm quite conscientious about it. Can no longer do my hair certain ways or go out without make up. Buyer beware!! Or if anyone knows of a cure - pls help me!
Acne_ Nausea_ Racing Heart_ Tingling/Numbness in arm and leg_ Headaches_ Dizziness (Hospitalized)
Comments: I had been on Yazmin for 6 years_ but due to the warning my Dr said to try something else. She recommended ALESSE and said it would work well. WELL.. IT DIDN'T. After about the first week I noticed a lot more acne than usual. I figured I'd stick it out and see if it would get any better. During this time I noticed my mood starting to change and one moment I was happy/feeling like myself and the next I was down and anxious about everything. Things went downhill after the 17th day of taking the pill when I woke up with a resting heart rate of 125 and tingling in my left hand. After calling 911_ an ambulance took me to the hospital and I was told later on to get off the pill IMMEDIATELY for I was having a severe reaction to the hormones (Most likely the hormone Levonorgestrel found in Alesse). After being discharged that day and told it would get better I had similar episodes of tingling/numbness in my leg and arm and the racing heart continued. I was back in the hospital within 24 hours. ALSO TO NOTE I HAD NO UNDERLYING HEALTH ISSUES AND WAS ON NO OTHER MEDICATIONS WHILE TAKING ALESSE.It has now been two days since I've been off the pill and I am out of the hospital. I have not had tingling or a racing heart in over 24 hours. I am slowly getting my appetite back. Also_ my acne is starting to clear up. I will not be trying any other birth control pill for the next 3 months.I would NOT recommend this pill to anyone after my experience.

Side Effects: I took these exact pills back when I was 19 for over a year with no problems. The I went completely birthcontrol free until I was 25. I went back on for 4 months ( no I did not use expired pills_ i got new ones). First month into it and I developed severely itchy skin on my labia. No rashes tho. I couldn't even sleep at night... For 4 damned months!  Yeast infection test came back negative. Then I realized perhaps there is a connection. I went off the pills and the symptoms were better within a week. It took bout a month or two to get back to normal. I've been Off of it for a year now but I find my skin gets sensitive now. I can't even wax my eyebrow without it itching for a few days after. And I've been waxing everything since I was 17
Short period_ extremely lighter flow_ fatigue

The first and only side effect I had for the first 3 months was nausea. At the time_ it was almost every day. I still have nausea for about a week every time I start a new pack_ but it goes away and isn't as severe. On month 4 I started to get really sore breasts about a week or so into a pack_ that would last about a week. Month 5_ and currently month 6_ I had the initial nausea at the start of a pack_ followed by sore breasts_ followed by extreme irritability and high emotions. I am having trouble dealing with my daughter (almost 3) because I'm so emotional. I find I'm getting angry at her and expecting things from her she can't do yet. I find that on top of this I'm obsessing on those things which makes me more angry and feeling like I'm spiraling out of control. This month_ I'm noticing that my face is really breaking out. I haven't had acne like this since I was pregnant with my daughter_ and before that_ highschool.
Comments: At first I thought this pill was great_ now I don't think I can stay on it. I don't want to end up harming my daughter or causing emotional scarring due to my inability to keep my emotions under control. The week before my period before Alesse I used to be able to step back_ take a deep breath_ and let an issue go. Now I seem to be unable to prevent myself from working myself up to the point where I break down in tears. I'm sure there are many people this pill works wonders for_ but I don't seem to be one of them.

Side Effects: Throwing up. Feeling sick after everything I ate. Heavy periods with bad cramping. Higher anxiety.
Moodiness_ depression_ anxiety_ lighter periods_ no sex drive
Comments: I had been getting more and more depressed and anxious while on this pill_ but I thought the cause was environmental. My boyfriend finally suggested I try going off Alesse_ and I started feeling much more level-headed. I had been feeling suicidal_ crying all the time_ unable to cope with stress--although I still get anxious_ HBC was definitely contributing to how I was feeling. I switched to Alesse because my doctor thought the lower dose would be better than my previous brand (I forget the name). I guess it didn't work.

Side Effects: in between period bleeding;weight gain;mood swings;no libido; yeast infection; fatigue; bloating; lighter periods; shorter periods;
Comments: I took bc to help with heavy long periods_ which did help they are shorter and lighter but I gained at least 10 lbs. in 4 months. After the first round of pills I had in between bleeding which I bleed till my next period it was mostly spotting and light bleeding but still a whole month ! I got 2 mild yeast infections_ When hubby was in the mood I was dry and never really in the mood_ I felt tired all the time like I had no energy to do anything. I also woke up several nights with cramps in my calf. It felt like I had a charlie horse. I think I am going to stop taking them just because of all the side effects I have experienced and worried about some of the ones I could experience!

Reason: treatment of acne and long periods
Side Effects: HORRIBLE breakouts. I still have scars half a year later.
mood swings_ extreamly emotional_ couldn't stop crying_anxiety_ panic attacks_ forgetful
Comments: I had a terrible time on this pill_ saw my docter and went off it right away. Later tried Micronor a pedstrogen only pill but had tingling on whole left side of body and had to go off right away too

Side Effects: Hair loss_ some weight gain
Comments: This pill made so much of my hair fall out_ I have about half as much as I did before I started it_ and it's been a few years now and it's still as thin as it was!  I would lose way more than usual when brushing and big clumps of it in the shower_ it took me a few weeks to realize that it was probably the pill_ it stopped getting worse when I went off it_ but even now_ I still lose a lot of hair.  I've tried lots of things to make it grow back and nothing will.  Don't take this if you don't have lots of hair to lose!  I also gained about 15-20 lbs but barely noticed that because of how bad a problem the hair loss was!

Side Effects: Maybe breast tenderness
Comments: Took Tri-Sprintec and another BC and had a lot of anxiety/depression etc. I looked up online what changes in BC might help_ and decided to ask for Alesse. From what I can tell_ I have not had any more mood issues. I do have low libido_ but this could be due to other things. Period isn't super heavy_ it's on time_ no pregnancy_ no noticeable/shocking weight gain_ and especially no mood changes = a winner for me!

Side Effects: extreme hair loss_ mood swings
Comments: within the first two to three weeks I noticed I was losing more hair than I usually did each day. I thought perhaps it was due to something else_ but it was not. I know they tell you to wait through a few cycles and I continued taking the generic Lutera for two months (generic because my pharmacy didn't carry Aless). I stopped taking it because I couldn't take the hair loss. I've always had really thick hair but now I have thin hair. I lost a weeks worth of hair in one day. It was coming out when I brushed and washed_ as well as throughout the day. My hair is still thin however the amount I'm losing has decreased dramatically_ it appears i'm back to normal and I have been off Lutera for one month. Also I noticed that I was having more trouble than usual controlling my mood swings_ and I was a lot more irritable. I am already a moody person and I was worse for those two months. But my periods were really light and short. So since I've been off_ I'm only shedding my usual amount of hair daily_ and I my moods are more stable_ well at least back to normal.

Side Effects: I started out taking brand name Alesse and then changed to generic Lutera for the past ~2 years - no side effects for the entire the time I've been on it_ until just recently - I'm starting to get a little spotting now between periods and also PMS symptoms at unusual times_ so I'm hunting for a new pill - I don't think there is a problem with the pill_ but rather my body has changed - I've gone through this a few times with oral contraceptives over the years
Comments: I actually take Alesse/Lutera a little like an extended cycle pill_ but I do mine for 6 weeks on_ 1 week off - it's been great to have fewer cycles and I didn't have any problems with it until just recently (but like I said above_ I think this is just because my body is changing) - my gyn offered to write the script this way for me when I was considering Seasonale several years ago - so I've taken Alesse as directed and 6 weeks on_ 1 week off without incident_ as well as generic Lutera 6 weeks on_ 1 week off without side effects_ but this golden age is coming to a close for me_ and after many years of menstrual bliss (light flow_ no cramps_ perfect clockwork regularity)_ the hunt begins again to find another that will do this for me

Side Effects: Extreme mood swings_ Depression_ PMDD_ Severe cramps_ vision problems_ Numbness in legs_ Breast Sensativity_ No labido_ No self-esteem_ Paranoia_ Anxiety_ Should I go on?
Comments: When I started Alesse last summer I had little to no side effects and was generally happy with it. As the months went on however I pretty much started to slowly lose my mind. When it came time for my period to start I would have so many mood swings that I was pretty much a different person. I could probably write a book on the problems I had with it. I don't recommend this pill_ but that's just me_ it effects everyone differently.

Side Effects: severe cystic acne_ rashes_ period every two weeks_ binge eating_ severe depression.
Comments: I was told by my doctor that this pill had the least amount of side effects.  If you want to feel and look like crap while on this medication_ take it. You will feel so great about yourself once the medicaiton settles in.

Side Effects: I did not experience any side effects.  It was a good pill for me.
cramps_ mood swings_ break-outs_ early period
Comments: after taking Yasmin for a year (and having no problem with it) my doctor wanted to switch me off because she was worried about its effects on my health later on in life. so she put me on alesse: the first two months in the middle of the pack i was having horrible cramps where i couldn't get out of bed. on the third month i skipped a pill and took it the next day (which i had done before on yasmin) and a few days later i got a heavier_ longer period than i'd had in over a year while i was still taking the pink pills. i also had awful mood swings and flipped out at my boyfriend for no reason and cried a lot more. not for everyone i guess

Side Effects: Dryer eyes_ rendering me unable within a month to wear contact lenses (even the dry eyes single use kind)
Comments: Altogether I had no big side effects. No weight gain whatsoever. This pill worked like a charm. The first month of taking it was punctuated by some light bleeding and nausea if I took the pill a few hours later than usual_ but those went away after that first month. I'm very satisfied of this product_ apart from being forced to wear glasses because of the extremely dry eyes (resembling that of the elderly according to my optometrist).

Side Effects: Mood swings
Comments: Best pill I've used. 3-4 days of semi-light_ little cramping periods. Every period was right on schedule_ unless I missed a pill. Had slight mood swings/feelings of hostility_ but it was manageable. Was on it for 10+ years_ never had problems.

Side Effects: Moodiness_ enxiety_ anger_ irrationability_ breakthrough bleeding_ acne
Comments: Alesse eventually made me crazy enough to go off it. Everything made me angry_ I was screaming all the time. And I am a really easy going person. Then the acne_ migraines and the breakthrough bleeding (after years on it) made me quit for good. Aviane (generic) was even worse even though they claim it's the same formula. No pill works for everyone.

Reason: other birth control is too pricy
Side Effects: nose bleeds_ nausea_ weight gain_ loss of appetite_ no sexual desire at all!
Comments: OMG I HATE THIS PILL! I have been on this pill less than a week and I'm stopping it now. I started it on a Monday and today is Friday and in those few days i started getting severe nose bleeds_ gained weight(significant) but at the same time I had no appetite. Every time I ate I felt like I was going to throw up and the worst part to me is I didn't want sex. That is weird to me because I ALWAYS want sex and now it is the last thing I want. I feel bad for my boyfriend:( I'm going back on my wallet-buster pill as of today. YAZ is amazing I was dumb to stop it.

Side Effects: depressed_ mood swings_ loss of sex drive (terrible_ to say the least)_ weight gain
Comments: I used to be on this pill about two years ago for 2 1/2 years straight and did not feel any side effect. I got off bc pills all together for a year and went back on it thinking it would be the same.  Very wrong. I spoke with my dr. he said it all depends on your body_ what might of worked for me then will not work for me now.  I went now to Zovia and experiencing the low sex drive and weight gain_ so I'm concidering stoping the pill. The only positive to bcp is increase in breast size_ but still not happy with all other aspects of it.

Side Effects: Recently_ breakthrough bleeding. Otherwise_ only positive effects -- less acne_ lighter/easier periods_ very regular periods_ stable mood.
Comments: I have LOVED this pill. I am very sensitive to hormonal contraceptives_ and have tried a lot (including Depo)_ and when I found that Alesse worked for me many years ago_ it was a life-saver. But now (at almost 30)_ I'm having breakthrough bleeding_ which my doctor thinks is due to my body changing and needing a higher-estrogen pill. Fingers crossed the new pill works ok...

Side Effects: -Mood swings! (Angry)-Anxious-Acne where there was none before.
Comments: Things were fine while I was on the generic version of Alesse (Aviane) for 3 years. 2 weeks ago_ my pharmacy offered brand name Alesse at the same price_ so I got it. Since then my moods have been AWFUL! I am angry and anxious all the time_ for no reason. I snap at every little thing. And my face is breaking out even worse.

Side Effects: Unpredictable periods_ extreme mood swings_ panic attacks_ depressed_ couldnt lose weight_ irritability. Always tired_ no sex drive at all_ bloating_ Chewing (I know it sounds weird but I was constantly chewing the inside of my mouth)
Comments: I started this pill because I was having completely painful and irregular periods. I got to the point where I would have to call out of work the first day of my cycle because my cramping would be so bad and I was always in the bathroom. I found out that I had IBS and my DOC said that I should try BC for the period pain. My OBGYN told me to try Alesse and I did it for 9 months. I NEVER would get my period on time and my period would last anywhere from 10-12 days. My periods werent heavy_ they were actually pretty decent_ but it would so long. My cramping wasnt as bad as before. I was finally able to go about my normal life during the first day of my cycle. Dont get me wrong_ I still had cramps_ they were just more tolerable. I was ALWAYS moody_ depressed and irritable. And worse of all_ I would take it out on those closest to me. I started to get panic attacks during my 4th month on the pill for no reason. I just couldnt take it anymore. I went back to my GYN

Side Effects: Significant weight gain_ depression_ complete loss of sex drive_ moodiness_ increase in breast size_ rash when out in the sun_ acne
Comments: The only positive side effect with Alesse is that it did regulate my periods. But it made everything else worse. I am in a committed relationship of almost 3 years_ and ever since taking alesse my sex drive is non existent. I have also gained about 30 pounds at least. I made an appt with my dr. to change_ and was prescribed yasmin. after reading horrible reviews about that i am deciding against taking either. im kind of at a loss.

Side Effects: Fatigue
Comments: I loved Alesse.  Alesse cleared my skin 100%_ had short_ light_ and cramp free periods_ never gained weight and sex was fantastic.  The only reason I went off Alesse was because it ran out and then I was switched to Yasmin_ which was nothing but hell!  I'm finally going back on Alesse after a year and a half of no birth control_ I can't wait.  Alesse and Yasmin both made me more tired but that's minor.

Side Effects: Constant bleeding for first month_ leg cramps_ acne_ heavy discharge
Comments: Had continuous bleeding for 1st cycle_ but after one month_ no problems.  Lighter periods. Severe leg cramps first month only.  Acne started after 3 months and I haven't had acne in years.  And heavy discharge that has not changed since starting pill.  Lots of comments about sex drive_ moods and weight gain_ but I had no problems with any of these issues.

Side Effects: 1st time around:  They don't put this on the package - what I call chewing anxiety.  Always felt the need to chew on my lip or bite my nails or pen or pencil.  Addicted to gum now.  Leg pain (NOT blood clot related).  2nd time around - still the chewing and leg pain_ dry mouth. Very very very short/light period.
Comments: I was put on it to stop my severe menstrual migraines.  It was discovered I have a very low estrogen level_ it cured other things we didn't realize were related to it.  7 years into it_ I built up a tolerance to it and started having breakthrough bleeding.  I spent 4 months on Ortho-tricyclin and gained 30 pounds.  Dr. switched me to Yaz_ and for the next 3_ I was vomiting and having migraine aurae.  I pleaded with the Dr. to let me try an Alesse generic_ and I've been on Aviane and happy ever since.

Side Effects: nothing of note
Comments: This is the one pill that I've been on that didn't give me hormonal migraines or crazy mood swings. I've been very happy with it. The only thing that has bothered me is that my period has gotten a bit irregular after 4 years of use from time to time_ even with proper usage.

Side Effects: Major depression_ increased anxiety_ weight gain_ breast tenderness
Comments: I was on Alesse twice; the first time I went off it was because I started smoking again (lame)_ and the second time_ I got severely depressed and my anxiety increased (I was previously diagnosed with both illnesses three years ago)

Side Effects: Exhaustion during first week_ minor headaches_ minor nauseau_ spotting during the first month
Comments: I was a little nauseous for the first couple days. I was extremely exhausted_ constantly_ during my first week. I randomly started bleeding quite heavily in the middle of sex in my second week of taking alesse_ oops_ sorry about the mess! These side effects all quickly went away_ and Alesse never affected my weight or moods. Although_ I randomly got minor headaches during the full year that I took it (And I used to never_ ever get headaches). However_ it didn't do very much for my cramps. It took the edge off but I was still in a lot of pain and bled heavily for the first two days. I'm on Loestrin now_ I like it better.

Side Effects: Pro: No cramps (first time in a few years!)Cons: constant headaches_ chronic fatigueness_ mood swings_ severe depression_ constant vaginal bleeding_ decreased sex drive
Comments: Worst pill ever!After 2 days of taking this pill I noticed vaginal bleeding that didn't stop until after I was off this pill and I was upset a lot...almost like I would be before my period without birth control.As soon as I began having almost suicidal thoughts and my mom constantly seeing me cry_I made an appt with my dr and immediately took me off.The headaches and always being tired did not help in school as stress is the name of the game in college.

Side Effects: NO WEIGHT GAIN! Yay!! But_ frequent yeast infections_ nausea and milk production for first 2 months (stopped after)_ slightly prolonged periods (mostly spotting-style though).
Comments: Honestly_ despite some of the negative side effects_ I really love Alesse. I have been on it nearly 4 years_ and have had almost no problems except those mentioned above. I did have small ovary cramps for the first year on the right side_ nothing major. I used to take OrthoTriCyclen and HATED it. That's where my yeast infections started (once a month!) and weight gain was severe and very hard to lose. Since being on Alesse_ I've lost all of the weight easily_ and gotten my yeast problems reduced. The first couple of months were hard_ I had nausea_ breast tenderness_ and some very slight milk production_ but it all stopped soon. I still have slightly longer periods than I'd like. On Ortho my periods were 4 days_ but I'd rather be 30 pounds lighter with a very light 7-8 day period than the other way around!

Side Effects: anxiety_ dizziness_ itchy skin and irritability were the worst symptoms.
Comments: This pill seemed to work for the first couple of months and then symptoms gradually began to get worse.  The last 2 months I had severe anxiety and dizziness and only felt good while having my period.  So I discontinued use.  It's taken 3 weeks to actually get back to feeling normal again.

Side Effects: Melasma spots on face when in the sun for only minutes a day_ after a year I began spotting all the time.
Comments: Alesse cleared my skin up completely after 3 months on it.. I literally did not get one zit_ did not gain weight_ lowered sex drive but potentially from the SSRI I take.

Side Effects: NO Libido -- very low except for a few days mid-cycle.  PMS symptoms and very snack for the last 2 weeks.  BUt the best bcp for me compared to Triphasil and even the generic AVIANNE.  (AVIANNE gave me bad acne_ increased appetite_ and moodiness.  Even though its bio-identical to Alesse.)
Comments: Very disappointed to learn they have discontinued making Alesse.  Have been taking it for the past 3 years after many expts with other bcps.  WHAT WILL YOU BE SWITCHING TO NOW? I'm looking for suggestions. The generic Avianne does not work for me.

Side Effects: severe migrane_ headache_ body aching_ heart bumping_ loss of sex drive
Comments: I really had to stop taking it even a month of cycle was finished_ cuz the medicine was literally making me sick.

Side Effects: extreme moodiness_ suicidal after not ever having this problem before
Comments: Two days after I quit taking it_ I felt much happier and suicidal thoughts completely stopped!

Side Effects: After about a year of taking it_ I experienced breakthrough bleeding.
Comments: I loved this pill so much.  I have been on many trying to find one that helps my mood swings.  This pill was great for my mood.  I hate that I started having breakthrough bleeding because I have not been able to find a new pill that doesn't make me crazy one week a month.

Side Effects: Irregular periods.
Comments: It was great besides irregilar periods...No nausea or anything.

Side Effects: Loss of sex drive; anxiety/emotional imbalance; HUGE breasts
Comments: I didn't notice any effects at all the first month or so_ but since being on it after about 5 months or so I have had horrible anxiety (which I have a history of already)_ am very emotional (I well up with tears for just about anything)_ and generally feel out of balance with my emotions.  On top of that I have almost no sex drive and want sex only a handful of day out of the month.  This pill is driving me crazy it seems and am thinking of switching to a tri-phasic pill like Ortho Tri-cyclen esp. for the loss of sex drive.  Also my breasts are huge_ I've gained some weight_ and have experienced vaginal dryness and breakthrough bleeding.  The only good thing about this pill is that my skin is clearer and my cramps are not nearly as bad.

Side Effects: Killed sex drive_ gained a little bit of weight_ acne in the beginning
Comments: I had NO libido w/ Alesse...it took care of my ovarian cysts and I gained about 3 lbs on this - when I got off the pill_ the weight came off.  Cystic acne was sporatic in the beginning_ esp behind my ears but this tapered.  No nausea or other side effects.

Side Effects: Mild acne_ mild fluid retention.
Comments: I prefer Lo-Ovral_ but have high blood pressure so I was switched to a couple different pills.  On Alesse_ I now have longer periods (about a week and a half) but they are VERY light and only happen every three months!  I get mild acne and fluid retention on occassion.  I haven't had any weight gain except for the fluid_ which goes away.  I don't have any of the crabbiness that I had on a progestin only pill (THOSE pills were bad-caused skin infections!) Overall_ I think Alesse is a great drug and it stomped my endometriosis symptoms dead.

Side Effects: I took Alesse for 8 years and last years started crying 2-3 days before period.  Dr. switched me to Desogen which made me gain weight.  In 8 years on Alesse I did not gain one pound_ on Desogen in two months I was huge.  And no sex drive at all on Desegon.
Comments: I would rather cry for those two days and be skinny and have regular sex_ and feel like a pig and wake up every morning mad on the whole world.

Side Effects: Extreme depression_ crying_ nausea_ panic attacks_ sleeplessness
Comments: If I had the money_ I'd be launching a lawsuit. I am in good health_ eat well_ exercise and am (well_ was) in a great relationship. But for about two months on this pill I was a raving maniac. From day one I was crying every single day (and I am not a cryer) and getting into fights with my boyfriend over nothing. I knew it was the pills_ but everyone told me to wait it out three months and these bad symptoms would go away. (Also_ in the accompanying literature_ while side effects like limb numbness are cause for emergency_ the only warning regarding depression is for people who were *already* depressed before taking the drug_ and even then the side effect is 'minor'). After crying at work and a near suicide attempt_ I went to the doc who told me to stop taking the pills. Immediately. And guess what? I immediately felt better. No depression_ no crying_ and I got my appetite back.The odd part is I felt like a failure_ not being able to 'tough it out.' I thought the birth cont

Side Effects: ACNE ACNE ACNE.  Didnt start until 8 months in.  I had no idea that the pill could cause this so i continued the pill for another year.  My skin was so bad and painful.  I never had acne before at all and now my face is hideous and ugly and i can barely cover it up with makeup.  2 years later and its still a mess.  The only time my face clears a little is when i have my period.  Had to go on spiro to block the adrogens that my body is still producing because of this drug.  im  hoping it works.
Comments: Besides the acne also experienced severely reduced libido and mood swings/irratability/depression.  Just use condoms... its so much better for your body!  I used the generic of this pill called aviane.

Side Effects: anxiety_ moodiness_ decreased libido
Comments: I'd stick with Alesse but for these anxiety attacks that I keep having (and the super decreased libido).  Never suffered anxiety attacks on the pill before_ so am switching to Yasmin.

Side Effects: Hair loss_ mood swings_ loss of sex drive_ some breakthrough bleeding
Comments: Wasn't the worse BC pill I've been on but still not great..I don't like losing  my hair!

Side Effects: Significant weight gain_ hair loss_ loss of libido_ moodiness_ depression.
Abundant amount of discharge. Seem to be more hungry.
Comments: Horrible and disgsting yellow discharge - which I had tested - came back negative for infection. Did not help with nausea_ headaches_ or my severe cramps! All that it did was make it shorter I obviously need to switch!

Side Effects: lots of breakthrough bleeding/increase in acne and facial oil/decreased premenstrual depression
Comments: seemed to not cause the hunger and mood swings other BCPs do

Side Effects: The major side effect I experienced was weight gain.  I've gained 10 pounds in 6 months. My husband is happier because my periods don't last 2 weeks anymore.  I have one every 3 months for about 5 days.
Some mood swings
Comments: All in all this was a drug that worked wonders for me.  I do experience the occational PMS_ (crying and getting angry) about once a month for about a week_ sometimes a wee bit longer_ but all in all it helped with everything. My sex drive increased_ I lost weight_ my period lasts for about 3 days_ hardly no cramping_ no nausea nothing. My only concern is the difficulty to find it now in drug stores.  Seems like they are running out of supplies.

Side Effects: No side effects that I can tell at this point!
Comments: This is the first pill I have tried since getting married. It is very effective as a contraceptive_ no real changes to my skin_ no weight change whatsoever_ no breakthrough bleeding_ nothing. I have missed a pill and just doubled up the next day with slight nausea. I might be concerned about the long-term effects. Other than that_ I love this.

Side Effects: Nothing really except for vaginal discharge.
Comments: I experienced virtually no side effects from this pill EXCEPT I had a lot of discharge_ which was attributed to the pill.  I was on it for 3 years and as soon as I went off it_ the discharge was gone.  Other than that_ I loved this one.

Side Effects: nauseau_ MIGRAINES_ oily skin_ acne
Comments: started out with nauseau_ then started getting migraines every single day for a year.  as soon as i realized it may be due to the pill_ i stopped taking it and the migraines went away.  it did stop the bad cramps_ but then again_ other bcp or other lifestyle/diet changes can do the same.  then after discontinuing the pill_ i had terrible acne that lasted two years (only diet helped this).  i am still dealing with side-effects: my period became lighter and lighter after stopping the pill and now i haven't had it for a year.  this is a scary drug.  i believe there are other low dose pills that have fewer side effects.

Side Effects: severe depression_ anger_ emotional numbness_ low libido
Comments: It took me almost 8 months to go back to normal after taking this pill. I should have known something was wrong when 3 days into it I couldn't get out of bed because I felt completely emotionally numb. But since I had unsuccessfully tried 4 other pills previously_ I gave it a shot. Although it did shorten and lighten my periods_ it worsened my cramps_ I had very low sex drive_ I was crying all the time and I was constantly angry_ depressed or emotionally shut down_ and managed to ruin a 2 year relationship with my boyfriend who could only put up with my insanity for so long. I went into therapy thinking I needed an anti depressant but more than a year later I know it was the alesse causing my problems and I will never be taking it again.

Side Effects: MELASMA (DARK SPOTS ON MY FACE)
Comments: I USED ALESSE JUST FOR TWO WEEKS_ I DIDN'T HAVE ANY OTHER SIDE EFFECT_ MELASMA IS SOMETHING THAT JUST FEW WOMEN DEVELOP.

Reason: severe stomach cramps all the time
Side Effects: none_ other that stomach cramps going away_ breakouts werent as bad before periods_ 5 days before my period after a year of taking them_ I had one day of spotting which kinda freaked me out_ I still dont know what it was from_ if anyone has any ideas what it might be from_ if you could e-mail me_ that'd be appreciated
Comments: I started getting cramps in December and couldnt eat much other than raw veggies. After losing 40 pounds and becoming dangerously thin_ and after seeing MANY specialists_ I went and saw a gynacologist who thought it may have been endometriosis_ but after doing some tests it wasn't that either_ so he put me on the pill for a trial 3 months to see if that cleared up any of my problems. After the first month on the pill I was able to eat normally and returned to my normal weight_ but I did gain alot of wheight in my thighs and hips

Side Effects: Lowered sex drive; otherwise this pill is great!
Comments: I'm actually taking Aviane_ the generic version.  As compared to Mircette_ this pill is great - no mood swings_ no weight gain_ very light periods.  However_ sex has become rather unpleasant - dryness_ loss of interest_ etc.  This kind of makes the whole thing pointless since I obviously don't need BC if I'm not having sex!!

Side Effects: Sometimes a period would take two days to kick into action and sometimes if I forgot to take a pill and took it a couple of hours late I would get my period early.  This is a plus though_ because I can control when I get my period.  Possible increase in sex drive (definitly NOT decreased).  No major changes in weight_ skin condition_ or mood.  Have started to notice more cramping (not necessarily more flow) with periods.
Comments: I think this oral contraceptive is fatastic.  I have been taking the active pills on a continual cycle for 2-3 packs so I'd only get my period once every 2-3 months.  It regulates periods very well.  I have also noticed that because a missed pill brings on a period so quickly_ that I can easily "tell" my body when to have a period.  "Tricking" my body into thinking that it's at the end of its cycle has been very effective and convenient!  I love it!

Side Effects: HORRIBLE ACNE AFTER 6 MONTHS OF USE.
This drug almost killed me. Please be careful_ and know the side effects of this drug so you can be watchful_ as they tend to sneak up on you.
Comments: After never having a depressed day in my life_ this drug made me suicidal after about two months. I had a complete personality change_ hated the people I loved the most. It has been two years since I have been off this nightmare pill but still struggle with depression. I know this mood change was due to feeling 100% better 48 hours after being off the pill. However_ each time I have PMS all the horrible feelings from this pill come back.

Side Effects: TERRIBLE moodswings--  and all i did was cry--- but i did lose some weight_ which could be attributed to my headaches and nausa.

severe depression and anxiety. I found myself rocking back and forth on the floor weeping uncontrollably. I have taken Paxil for 11 years for depression/anxiety_ have been stable for all that time. One week after starting Alesse_ I felt like I did before the Paxil. Terrifying.
Comments: My doctor's response was that the mood swings would stop once my body got used to the drug. There was no way I could continue long enough to find out. Three or four days after discontinuing Alesse_ I was back to normal. and FURIOUS that I had not been told about the potential disabling side effects!

Side Effects: Extreme breast swelling and tenderness; DECREASE in libido; mood swings.
Comments: The decrease in or disappearance of my libido was the most disturbing side effect. In that way_ I suppose_ it was a very effective birth control.

Side Effects: Almost all androgenic side effects_ but mood swings and depression were the worstBreakthrough bleeding - menstruation for 2 weeks
spotting (see comments) - acne - and worst of all_ became PREGNANT.  **Took this pill meticulously**.
Comments: Spotting supposedly sign of inadequate pill.  No pms_ no mood swings_ light flow.Pregnancy!Obviously discontinued and opted for other brand.

Side Effects: Bad Acne and psycho-mood swings. Was on for 3 months and after each period was over_ experienced mad itching and pain in vaginal area. Was unable to have sex because of the pain and experienced vaginal discharge that was unlike a yeast infection. Each month doctor would take tests and could never figure out what was going on. That is even more scary than the problem I think.
Comments: Has anyone had the same symptoms? Please email me...concerned. If so_ what BC did you try after this? Was there success?

Side Effects: Within my 5th month I had abdominal bloating and cramping_ breakthrough bleeding (constant_ as heavy as a regular period with blood clots_ halfway through the pill pack).  More pimples and slight headaches (daily).
Comments: Seemed to have worked for the first 4months but then true side-effects occured within my 5th month.

Side Effects: Migraines_ numbness of my hands/feet_ nausea
Comments: At first I loved this pill_ then I started having severe migraines almost daily and my feet and hands were constantly numb. As soon as I stopped taking this drug all of my symptoms dissappeared. It also didn't help my skin at all.

Side Effects: breast enlargement_ dryness_ extreme depression and anxiety_ moodiness
Comments: the first month or so were alright but anxiety and depression increaded greatly in the next couple of months_ it became unbearable. i seriously thought there was something really wrong with me but then i talked to some people and read some of other peoples side effects and found out it was the pill. i am getting off of this pill right away_ i honestly cant take this complete change in me and my moods. if anyone eles is feeling extreme depression and anxiety i suggest you find a new birth controle pill like i am.

Side Effects: no side effects!!!!!
Comments: I have had absolutely no side effects on Alesse.  This is a very low-dose pill and I haven't had any spotting.  No weight gain_ no mood swings_ no fluid retention.  I am definetely staying on Alesse.

Side Effects: Overall I liked this BCP.  It really increased my sex drive - which was a bit much for my boyfriend at times.  It didn't cause any weight gain.  Only problem is the high androgen content may increase acne.  I didn't have a problem for years on this_ but then out of nowhere started having breakouts again.  I switched off alesse thinking it may be related.
Comments: The generic version aviane_ was cheaper and seemed the same to me.

Side Effects: This was the first birth control pill I was able to tolerate.  No bothersome side effects for nearly three years except very rare breakthrough bleeding.  Recently I've been having breakthrough bleeding every month_ so that my period lasts for 2 - 3 weeks out of the month.  I've also been having cramping and PMS symptoms starting very early in the pack.
Comments: I would say this is a good pill for women who have trouble with headaches and other things with higher dose pills.  I am told breakthrough bleeding is very common.  I will be switching shortly.  I'm not looking forward to testing more pills.

Side Effects: Moodiness_ Depression_ very irregular periods (timing and length)
Comments: This pill and my body chemistry did not mix. It was the worst of the handful I tried.

Side Effects: nothing at first... but after 3 years: diminished libido_ acne_ and practically non-existent periods
Comments: This pill was great for the first three years_ then I started having some very annoying side effects.  For example_ my skin became very oily_ eventually causing pretty major break-outs.  My sex drive also diminished almost entirely_ and while I was pretty happy with my light periods at first (3-4 days) it started to get a little nerve-wracking when they were less than a day long.  But Alesse was completely effective at keeping me baby-free_ which was the main goal!  I also never had any break-through bleeding_ bloating_ nausea_ or any other PMS symptom.  I've since switched to Ortho Tri-Cyclen Lo and I've already noticed a difference in my skin and sex drive; I'm still waiting to see if my periods become any heavier.
I love these pills. My periods are lighter and are not as long. If you do forget to take a pill_ however_ there is a good chance of having some quick spotting. I recommend it though.

Side Effects: None.
Comments: Really great pill (and I've tried many). No side effects at all. Helped clear my skin.

Side Effects: Terrible acne_ was on accutance to get rid of acne (which it did) went on this for four months_ and my skin was absolutely horrible.

weight gain (a lot)_ bloating_ moodiness_ lack of energy and depressed - i ate healthier and have always worked out regularly and the bloating and weight gain were terrible. i stopped it halfway through my 2nd month b/c i HATED the side effects.
Comments: did its job for birth control but for my first time on a pill the side effects completely freaked me out! i am now on minestrin (less estrogen) so i hope that will work better. -- also look into 'desogen' - its a different type of progestin_ ill switch to that if the minestrin doesnt work.

Side Effects: I thought I loved it at first_ but my dermatologist just told me that my acne is probably due to this pill which I hadn't realized as I didn't have it the first year on the pill.  If I was late in taking a pill  by a few hours_ I'd usually have break-through bleeding lasting the rest of the cycle and then the full period when I was supposed to.  I didn't notice a weight gain_ that was the reason I switched from Ortho tri-cyclene because I definitely had a gain on that pill.
blood pressure shot up and had excruciating headaches_ stopped taking pill and still having them.
slight weight gain in the beginning (5 lbs)
Comments: I loved it.  It kept me child free_ no weight gain_ no crazy mood swings_ libido stayed about the same.  MY ONLY COMPLAINT: NOT ENOUGH CLINICS CARRY IT OR PRESCRIBE IT!

Side Effects: No real side effects whatsoever.  I switched to Alesse after taking a couple of other pills for a few years and found Alesse to be the easiest.  I have had no mood swings or weight gain.  I have just recentely stopped taking the pill as I am no longer in a relationship and had a very low libido while in the relationship.  I cannot be sure but I think the pill may have had an impact on my sex drive so I am going off to see what my
Decreased libido
Crazy weight gain
low sex drive/ moodiness/ breast tenderness
Comments: but never got pregnant

Side Effects: breakthrough bleeding and spotting in first few months.
Comments: after the first three months i had no side effects whatsoever_ and my periods are lighter and easier.

Side Effects: loss of libido
Comments: Alesse was great_ evened my cycle out_ but my sex drive was gone.  Not worth it.

Side Effects: very happy no weight gain or side effects

terrible weight gain because of uncontrollable appetite; about 20 lbs in the six months I was on the pill.  appetite went back to normal after stopping the pill_ but it was really hard to lose the weight.
None thus far
my skin is breaking out like never before. i was originally taking levlite and i liked it a lot better.
breakthrouh
periods lasting up to 2 weeks_ and heavy bleeding
nausea
Comments: I was worried about weight gain_ but actually lost about 10 lbs the first 6 months on Alesse.  Since then though_ I've noticed an increase in weight in the stomach/thigh area that seems to be typical to bcp's.  Periods are predictable...same time/day each month_ which is nice.  Decrease in PMS symptoms at first_ but am gradually becoming grouchy - just like the pre-Alesse days!

Side Effects: Very low sex drive_ thinning of hair
Migraines - starting the first day of the placebo week and lasting several days into the placebo week. Very debilitating.
None. If I miss a pill_ the hormone upset triggers a migraine (which I would normally get the week before menstruating anyway).
Comments: Periods became regular_ and much less severe (less cramping_ less bleeding). However_ PMS (including depression_ anxiety_ irritability_ bloating_ and breast tenderness) was not improved.

Side Effects: broke out_ moody_ period duration was shorter_ but heavier in the beginning.
Comments: controlled period.

Side Effects: I experienced virtually no side effetcs from the pill (except a bit of breakthrough bleeding at the very beginning). However_ after 4.5 years taking Alesse_ I have experienced some break through bleeding again.

I initially gained about 15 lbs_ but this could very well have been my fault and not the pill's. I went off the pill for 3 months and when I started taking it again_ I did not experience any weight gain_ or any other side effects.
Comments: One thing I noticed is sometimes if I was a few hours late taking it (got home late and forgot to take my pack with me_ for example)_ I would get my period the next day_ and then of course I'd have it AGAIN at the end of my pack_ so I'd have my period twice in one month. That's no fun_ believe me_ so my doctor switched me to Ortho Tri-Cyclen to see if it makes a difference.

Side Effects: I took this pill for almost 7 years with absolutely no side effects then had 3 months in a row of spotting_ breast tenderness_ bloating and increase in breast size.
Comments: For the first 6.5 years this pill worked wonderfully.

Side Effects: So far_ abdominal bloating and cramping_ breakthrough bleeding (constant_ as heavy as a regular period_ halfway thrugh the pill pack)_ and moodiness
Comments: I know I've got to give it a couple more cycles_ but I'm tempted to just go back to Loestrin_ which I was on for years with NO problems at all...

Side Effects: some breast tenderness_ no worse than i usually get before my period_ and a bit of moodiness the first week
Comments: i've only used them for one cycle and i can't believe how much more bearable they've made my period... lots of people warned me about things like weight gain and depression_ but i think that these pills have helped me a lot (i used to be completely useless for a week from pms_ and another week from my actual period_ every month... i'm only 18!) and if you're considering taking them_ don't let other people's side effects put you off because everybody's different

Side Effects: Even heavier and longer periods
Heavier and longer periodsBlood pressure higherIrritabilityCraving Snack Foods
breast tenderness_ headche
Comments: I actually experienced less cramp than before I started the pills_ but I always feel headche on the first day when I start a pack. I think it's a pretty good choice for contraception_ but after reading all these negative comments about Alesse I am a little shaky..

Side Effects: Constant bleeding the entire time taken_ increasing daily to the point of 3-4 pads a day; rash over my body (eczema-like; never had sensitive skin before)
Comments: Did control moods well and didn't have pimples

Side Effects: Unbelievable_ uncontrollable weight gain: 20 lbs in 3 months. I went from a size 6 to size 14. In desperation_ I stopped eating for two days_ which normally would cause weight loss. Result? My body just kept growing. Also experienced unquenchable thirst (9 litres a day_ which is enough to flush out your electrolytes); constipation; chronic insomnia (awake 3 hours each night); and severe depression.  After three months of this_ I was switched to Ministrin_ the other low-dose OC (only available in Canada).  Lost the incredible thirst_ but it took 3 years to lose the weight and stop the depression & insomnia.  NB:  I've only just recognized now_ 5 years after starting OCs for endometriosis_ how severely depressed I was_ and that it was related to the OCs. If you experience depression after starting OCs_ please take it seriously and seek treatment.
Comments: This is a low-estrogen dose oral contraceptive (20 mcg)_ so it's often prescribed by physicians concerned about the effects of higher estrogen doses.

Side Effects: Depression_ Anxiety (sounds weird but this was almost disabling) and ACNE_ ACNE_ ACNE
Comments: Be careful with this one.  It's highly androgenic.

Side Effects: Used it continuously for 5 years with no complaints. But after that time I started having some dark patches of skin on my cheeks_ a more sluggish metabolism_ and it made my cervix very sensitive--causing an abnormal Pap.
Comments: It didn't cause me to gain weight_ my Dr said it's because it only has 20 mcg of synthetic estrogen...whereas many pills have 35 mcg of it.

Side Effects: Headache_ cramps_ and moodiness.
uncontrollable weight gain
weight gain (severe)_ Hypertension
Comments: Took a while to regulate my periods_ however I still have been starting my periods a week before the last row. I don't know what is up with that. Weight gain has been such a pain in the ass!
